Package com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.screens

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.screens.Tile
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a Tile on the player-accessible parts of level screen. -> Contains: --> Position (relative to texture) --> Height/Width --> Occupied boolean --> Associated methods to provide encapsulation

    • getPositionTile

      public int[] getPositionTile()
      Returns:
      The position of the Tile on the game board

    • getTileCoords

      public float[] getTileCoords()
      Method to return screen coordinates of given tile (from bottom left)
      Returns:
      float[2] of form [screen coord x, screen coord y]

      public TiledObject getOwnedBy()

    • isOccupiedBy

      public boolean isOccupiedBy​(TiledObject to)
      Returns:
      True if tile occupied by TiledObject ; False otherwise

    • withinTile

      public boolean withinTile​(TiledObject o)
      Method to check if sprite passed is within range to be placed in the centre of an object
      Returns:
      true: Sprite is on Object
